definition.text:
1. Foulness; dirtiness; filthiness.Be not troublesome to thyself or to others by uncleanness
2. Want of ritual or ceremonial purity. Leviticus 1 5:3.
3. Moral impurity; defilement by sin; sinfulness.I will save you from all your uncleanness Ezekiel 3 6:1
7.
4. Lewdness; incontinence. Colossians 3:5. 2 Peter 2:
10.
